titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrating its 85th anniversary.
Supporting the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrating its 85th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrates its 85th anniversary.
Encourages individuals throughout the United States to improve their public speaking and leadership skills.
